stimulusHtml:
Respond to parts A, B, C, D, and all subparts.

(a) Preserving high-quality agricultural land is important so that countries can grow enough food to feed their populations.

features.html: Write your answers in the spaces provided. Where calculations are required, clearly show how you arrived at your answer. Where explanation or discussion is required, support your answers with relevant information and/or specific examples.

stimulusHtml: (i) Describe one agricultural practice that can lead to the degradation of agricultural land.

features.html: Write your answers in the spaces provided. Where calculations are required, clearly show how you arrived at your answer. Where explanation or discussion is required, support your answers with relevant information and/or specific examples.

stimulusHtml: (ii) Describe a potential solution or technique that can prevent or reduce degradation of agricultural land.

features.html: Write your answers in the spaces provided. Where calculations are required, clearly show how you arrived at your answer. Where explanation or discussion is required, support your answers with relevant information and/or specific examples.

stimulusHtml: (b) A less developed country with a rapidly expanding urban population is concerned that its growing urban population will eventually expand to a level where there would not be enough land to grow the food it needs to support its population.

features.html: Write your answers in the spaces provided. Where calculations are required, clearly show how you arrived at your answer. Where explanation or discussion is required, support your answers with relevant information and/or specific examples.

stimulusHtml: (i) Excluding importing food, propose a solution to address the concerns of reduced land on which to grow food.

features.html: Write your answers in the spaces provided. Where calculations are required, clearly show how you arrived at your answer. Where explanation or discussion is required, support your answers with relevant information and/or specific examples.

stimulusHtml: (ii) For your solution in (b)(i), explain an additional potential advantage of the solution.

features.html: Write your answers in the spaces provided. Where calculations are required, clearly show how you arrived at your answer. Where explanation or discussion is required, support your answers with relevant information and/or specific examples.

stimulusHtml:
(c) A table for the population size in the country is shown below.

Population Size from 2009 to 2017

YearPopulation Size (millions)
20092.7
20102.8
20113.0
20123.3
20133.6
20143.9
20154.2
20164.4
20174.6

features.html: Write your answers in the spaces provided. Where calculations are required, clearly show how you arrived at your answer. Where explanation or discussion is required, support your answers with relevant information and/or specific examples.

stimulusHtml: (i) Based on the table, calculate the percent change of the population size in this country between 2009 and 2017. Show your work.

features.html: Write your answers in the spaces provided. Where calculations are required, clearly show how you arrived at your answer. Where explanation or discussion is required, support your answers with relevant information and/or specific examples.

stimulusHtml: (d) An average person in the country needs 2,450 kilocalories (kcal)/day of food to meet their full nutritional needs. The average number of kcal per hectare (ha) produced from available food in the country is 15,737,000kcal/ha.

features.html: Write your answers in the spaces provided. Where calculations are required, clearly show how you arrived at your answer. Where explanation or discussion is required, support your answers with relevant information and/or specific examples.

stimulusHtml: (i) Calculate the amount of land that would be needed to produce enough kilocalories to feed a person for one year in this developing country. Show your work.

features.html: Write your answers in the spaces provided. Where calculations are required, clearly show how you arrived at your answer. Where explanation or discussion is required, support your answers with relevant information and/or specific examples.

stimulusHtml: (ii) Calculate how much land would have been needed to feed the population of this country in 2017. Show your work.

features.html: Write your answers in the spaces provided. Where calculations are required, clearly show how you arrived at your answer. Where explanation or discussion is required, support your answers with relevant information and/or specific examples.
